alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; DeSoto; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 4:58PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Highlands, eastern Charlotte, eastern DeSoto and northeastern Lee Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 457 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Lake Placid to near Lehigh Acres. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Myers, Sebring, Lake Placid, Lehigh Acres, Sylvan Shores, Lake Istokpoga, Southwest Florida Airport, Sebring Regional Airport, San Carlos Park, Charleston Park, Olga, Venus, Buckingham, Three Oaks, East Dunbar, Villas, Cornwell, Tice, Lake Josephine and Placid Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Lee; DeSoto; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
